title: Deals: Apple’s new spring iPhone 13 cases see first discounts, Apple Watch Series 7 $99 off, more
content:
Heading into the weekend, Apple’s new spring collection of iPhone 13 silicone cases are on sale for the first time to lead the way. That’s alongside a new 2022 low on Apple’s official MagSafe Battery Pack and $99 off Apple Watch Series 7 cellular. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Apple’s new spring iPhone 13 cases see first discounts, Apple Watch Series 7 $99 off, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple's new iPhone 13 spring case collection launched back in March and is on sale for the first time at $40 each. Plus more.
